title: 尼格風球│5:20a.m或之前改3號風球 落波2小時內上班？勞工處咁講
description: 【木1o尼格／8號風球／上班安排／復工／勞工處指引／天文台／天氣消息】八號東南烈風或暴風信號現正生效，天文台預告將於清晨5時20分或以前改發三
content:
【木1o尼格／8號風球／上班安排／復工／勞工處指引／天文台／天氣消息】八號東南烈風或暴風信號現正生效，天文台預告將於清晨5時20分或以前改發三號強風信號。究竟8號風球「落波」後何時要上班？是否2小時內必須復工？可以看看勞工處的《颱風及暴雨警告下的工作守則》如何安排。
2018年颱風山竹襲港後，有打工仔站塌樹前的相片十分震撼，成為港人熱愛「返工」的代表作。（資料圖片）
問題一：改發3號風球後何時要上班？
根據勞工處《颱風及暴雨警告下的工作守則》，僱主和僱員應預早協商在八號信號或黑色暴雨警告信號取消... [991 chars]

title: Thousands gather for Const. Shaelyn Yang funeral
description: Fallen B.C. RCMP officer Shaelyn Yang had an extraordinary and unwavering faith in humanity, her family said during an emotional funeral service Thursday.
content:
Fallen B.C. RCMP officer Shaelyn Yang had an extraordinary and unwavering faith in humanity, her family said during an emotional funeral service Thursday.

title: Cubot Pocket 3: o mais pequeno dos Androids já chegou ao lado do Cubot Note 30
description: Os Cubot Note 30 e Pocket 3 já tinham sido anunciados há algumas semanas como propostas de entrada de gama, com preços abaixo dos 125 €.
content:
Os Cubot Note 30 e Pocket 3 já tinham sido anunciados há algumas semanas como propostas de entrada de gama, cujos preços de lançamento se posicionam numa faixa abaixo dos 125 €.

title: Ethiopia: Warring parties agree on 'permanent cessation of hostilities'
description: The Ethiopian government and the Tigray People's Liberation Front (TPLF) have agreed to permanently end hostilities, in a significant step toward ending the grinding war that has seen thousands of people killed, millions displaced, and millions more left in urgent need of food assistance.
content:

title: Kattparasiten som flera svenskar bär på
description: Kattparasiten tar sig in i människors hjärnor och kan vara livshotande och nästan var femte person i Sverige bär på smittan. ​
content:
Visste du att en parasit från katter kan påverka människors beteende? Mellan 15 och 20 procent av alla svenskar bär på parasiten toxoplasma, som sjukdomen heter, vars naturliga hemvist är katter och andra djur som möss, skriver Dagens Nyheter.
